links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..20000
Index entries for continued fractions for constants
formula: a(n) = (1/2)*(17 + 15*(-1)^n) - 8*(binomial(2*n,n) mod 2). - _Paolo P. Lava_, Jun 10 2009a(n) = 4^(1+(-1)^n) for n>0, a(0)=8. [_Bruno Berselli_, Dec 29 2015]
prog: (PARI) { allocatemem(932245000); default(realprecision, 26000); x=contfrac(sqrt(80)); for (n=0, 20000, write("b040071.txt", n, " ", x[n+1])); } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 09 2009
crossrefs: Cf. A010532 Decimal expansion. - _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 09 2009
